text:
Monseñor Héctor Morena Vega (20 February 1926 – 23 December 2017) was a Costa Rican Roman Catholic bishop. Morena Vegas was ordained to the priesthood in 1949. He served as bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Tilaran, Costa Rica from 1979 to 2002. He was born in Tilarán, Costa Rica.
Morena Vegas died on 23 December 2017 of complications from pneumonia in Tilarán, aged 91.
